articles.author: Gerald Imray
articles.title: First group of 49 white South Africans leaves for the US after Trump offered them refugee status - AP News
articles.description: A group of 49 white South Africans has departed their homeland for the United States on a private charter plane having been offered refugee status by the Trump administration. The group, which included families and small children, left Johannesburg on Sunday …
articles.content: CAPE TOWN, South Africa (AP) A group of 49 white South Africans departed their homeland Sunday for the United States on a private charter plane having been offered refugee status by the Trump adminis… [+4891 chars]
